YOU DON'T NEED TO GET US STUFF
BUT IF YOU MUST:
We are so thrilled to have you join our celebration! As many of you know, we have been building our lives together over the last 9.5 years including our shared home over the last 6. We are blessed to have a home that is already pieced together with everything we could ever need. We would always rather see your smiling face at the BBQ, but we’ve setup a registry for those that have expressed interest in offering a more traditional gift; and because we can’t ever do something perfectly conventional, we’ve set up a traditional registry through Amazon and a Honeymoon registry.
